ca.tirtech.etchpad.drawingView

Class DrawingModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
      • androidx.lifecycle.AndroidViewModel
        • ca.tirtech.etchpad.drawingView.DrawingModel

  • public class DrawingModel
extends androidx.lifecycle.AndroidViewModel
    LiveModel for storing UI information across the UI lifecycle. This class contains data about the drawing created in the app. This model responds to user interactions and updates drawing information appropriately. This model may also have the drawing data saved and loaded from the devices file system using the save(Context) and load(Context) methods.
